page.title: 19THE MAGIC OF KNOTT END.
page.content: In interviews with people living in Knott End one word cropped up often: { kindness},and these are some comments { "}I like the atmosphere here because it is happy and busy but satisfying{"} ;{"}How exciting and what fun life is!{"};{"}I like the atmosphere and the peaceful life{"};{"}a very pleasant and friendly village{"};{"}It is quiet and peaceful and retains its rural life{"};{"}It is a close-knit family life.We work 24 hours a day on the farm but wouldn't change places with anyone{"}I like the people's kindness{"};{"} It has a certain primitive magic{"};{"}It should stay as it is{"};{"}To me the river is like the River Nile, the sea is like the Sea of Galilee, the fishermen are like the disciples and the hills in the distance are like Mount Sinai{"}.Those last remarks came from a young woman!
